trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnReordered" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnReordered" /> 事件的資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnReordered> event can be canceled by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnReordered>設定也可以取消事件<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: However, if the event is cancelled, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.NewDisplayIndex%2A> will not change to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.OldDisplayIndex%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果事件已取消，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.NewDisplayIndex%2A>不會變更為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.OldDisplayIndex%2A>值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this type.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個型別。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnReordered> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnReordered>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> named `ListView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>名為`ListView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnReordered> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnReordered>事件。

trans-unit.source: The previous display position of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" /> 之前的顯示位置。

trans-unit.source: The new display position for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" /> 新的顯示位置。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" /> that is being reordered.
trans-unit.target: 正在重新排列的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" /> that is being reordered.
trans-unit.target: 取得正在重新排列的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" /> that is being reordered.
trans-unit.target: 正在重新排列的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnReordered?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the new display position of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" />
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" /> 之前的顯示位置。

trans-unit.source: The new display position of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" /> 新的顯示位置。
